llm_processing.creative_direction: Modern workspace with Test Soda as productivity fuel
llm_processing.image_prompt:
Create a promotional image for Test Soda with the following specifications:

- Style: Modern, tech-inspired imagery with clean lines
- Mood: Energetic, focused, productive
- Color Palette: #0078D7, #50E6FF, #2D2D30, #FFFFFF
- Target Audience: 18-34 year olds interested in active lifestyle, technology, social media
- Aspect Ratio: 1:1

The image should:
- Feature Test Soda as the focal point
- Evoke emotions of refreshed, energized, happy
- Address pain points like stress, fatigue, boredom
- Have space for text overlay at the bottom
- Be photorealistic and high quality
- Not include any text in the image itself

This is concept 1 for the campaign.
